title: Bug 27869 - StyledText overuses Font.getFontData
description: Bug 27869 - StyledText overuses Font.getFontData. Btw, UTF8 is the default English encoding for Redhat 8. The FontMetrics API is also heavily used by the StyledText. I believe that the metric information should be cached in the StyledText and updated only when the font is changed.
OB: The overuse of Font.getFontData by the StyledText should be addressed to improve performance.
EB: I believe, and many people agree, that the StyledText should not use the Font.getFontData API when it is being typed.
SR: The StyledText should be optimized to reduce the usage of the Font.getFontData API and instead cache the metric information for improved performance.
